description: If you’ve been following the Kickstarter campaign for our new card game, One Billion Users, then you know we’re not quite on track on to hit our goal — but we haven’t given up! title: Five Days Left To Help Us Make One Billion Users, The Social Media Card Game

description: Those of you who still believe the nation’s courts are capable of handling the constitutionally-guaranteed redress of grievances, prepare to be disabused of those notions. While the courts may occasionally care about rights, they’re far more willing to protect the government status quo than allow mere citizens to upset the status quo apple cart. We’ve […]
title: Appeals Court Declares Injunction Against Ohio’s Blocking Of Immunity-Stripping Bill Moot Because It Dicked Around Long Enough To Make It Moot
